description: This file defines routing components for a Flutter TV application, including route constants, a router configuration, a custom router delegate, a route information parser, and a navigation helper. It manages navigation stack and route parsing for different screens such as Home, Details, Settings, Search, and Watchlist.

classes.name: AppRoutes
classes.description: Defines static route string constants used throughout the app.

classes.name: AppRouterDelegate
classes.description: Manages the navigation stack and current route for the app, building pages based on current path and args.

classes.name: AppRouteInformationParser
classes.description: Parses route information from URI or string to manage app routes.

classes.name: AppNavigator
classes.description: Provides static methods for navigating programmatically without BuildContext, wrapping the router delegate.

methods.name: buildRouter
methods.description: Creates a RouterConfig object with the custom delegate and parser.

methods.name: setNewRoutePath
methods.description: Updates the current route based on incoming route information.

methods.name: _setPath
methods.description: Updates internal path and args, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: parseRouteInformation
methods.description: Converts RouteInformation into route path string.

methods.name: restoreRouteInformation
methods.description: Converts route configuration back into RouteInformation.

methods.name: go
methods.description: Navigates to the specified path with optional arguments.

methods.name: of
methods.description: Retrieves an AppNavigator instance from the BuildContext.
